00026   $rsTimes = mysql_query("SELECT TU_START,TU_DURATION,TU_TYP FROM timeunits WHERE TU_TYP='1' ORDER BY TU_START");
00027   $cnt_times = mysql_num_rows($rsTimes);
00028   $starttimes = array();

(".$data['class_name'].")</span></td>";

00133 <script type="text/javascript">
00134 var dragables = document.getElementsByClassName('draggable');
00135 for(var i=0;i<dragables.length;i++) {
00136   new Draggable( dragables[i], {revert:true,constraint:'vertical' });
00137 }
00138 
00139 var dropables = document.getElementsByClassName('dropables');
00140 for(var i=0;i<dropables.length;i++) {
00141   Droppables.add(dropables[i], {hoverclass:"dropHover",accept:"draggable",onDrop:function(draggable,droparea) {
00142     if(droparea.innerHTML!="&nbsp;") return false;
00143     var bookID = draggable.firstChild.id.replace('book_','');
00144     var room = draggable.id.split("_");
00145     var old_room_nr = room[1];
00146     if(room[0].indexOf("duplicate")>-1) var isDuplicate = true;
00147     else var isDuplicate = false;
00148     var time = room[2]+"_"+room[3];
00149     var color = draggable.style.backgroundColor;
00150     var newroom = droparea.id.split("_");
00151     var new_room_nr = newroom[1];
00152     var newtime = newroom[2]+"_"+newroom[3];
00153     
00154     if(newtime!=time) return false;
00155 
00156     xajax_changeRoom(bookID,new_room_nr);
00157     
00158     var views = new Array();
00159     views[0] = "default";
00160     views[1] = "labor";
00161     views[2] = "all";
00162     
00163     var html = draggable.innerHTML;
00164     for(var i=0;i<views.length;i++) {
00165       // put lesson to new room
00166       if($('room'+views[i]+'_'+new_room_nr+'_'+time)) {
00167         $('room'+views[i]+'_'+new_room_nr+'_'+time).innerHTML = html;
00168         $('room'+views[i]+'_'+new_room_nr+'_'+time).style.background = color;
00169         $('room'+views[i]+'_'+new_room_nr+'_'+time).style.color = "rgb("+getContrast(color.substring(4,color.length-1))+")";
00170         $('room'+views[i]+'_'+new_room_nr+'_'+time).className = "dropables draggable";
00171         new Draggable( $('room'+views[i]+'_'+new_room_nr+'_'+time), {revert:true,constraint:'vertical' });
00172       }
00173       
00174       if(!isDuplicate && $('room'+views[i]+'_'+old_room_nr+'_'+time)) {
00175         // delete lesson from old room
00176         $('room'+views[i]+'_'+old_room_nr+'_'+time).innerHTML = '&nbsp;';
00177         $('room'+views[i]+'_'+old_room_nr+'_'+time).style.background = 'transparent';
00178         $('room'+views[i]+'_'+old_room_nr+'_'+time).className = "dropables";
00179       }
00180     }
00181     
00182     if(isDuplicate) {
00183       // delete lesson from old room
00184       $('roomduplicate_'+old_room_nr+'_'+time).innerHTML = '&nbsp;';
00185       $('roomduplicate_'+old_room_nr+'_'+time).style.background = 'transparent';
00186       $('roomduplicate_'+old_room_nr+'_'+time).className = "duplicate";
00187       }
00188   } });
00189 }
00190 
00191 function switchVisibility(className) {
00192   var elements = document.getElementsByClassName(className);
00193   if(elements[0].style.display=="none") {
00194     // show all rows
00195     for(var i=0;i<elements.length;i++) {
00196       try {
00197         // for FF
00198         elements[i].style.display = "table-row";
00199       } catch(e) {
00200         // for IE
00201         elements[i].style.display = "block";
00202       }
00203     }
00204   } else {
00205     // hide all rows
00206     for(var i=0;i<elements.length;i++) {
00207       elements[i].style.display = "none";
00208     }
00209   }
00210   
00211   var icon = $('icon_'+className);
00212   if(icon.src.indexOf("open.gif")>-1) icon.src = "img/closed.gif";
00213   else icon.src = "img/open.gif";
00214 }
00215 
00216 function checkForDuplicateRooms() {
00217   var duplicates = document.getElementsByClassName('duplicates');
00218   for(var i=0;i<duplicates.length;i++) {
00219     if(duplicates[i].innerHTML!="") {
00220       if(confirm("Es gibt noch Vorlesungen, denen kein Raum zugeordnet wurde. Wollen Sie die entsprechenden Vorlesungen löschen?")) {
00221         
00222       } else {
00223         // Reload
00224         location.href = location.href;
00225       }
00226       return true;
00227     }
00228   }
00229 }
